  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client​(java.lang.Boolean cli, java.lang.Boolean debug)
      Main client constructor, builds the client maps and starts the UI
      Parameters:
      cli - true if CLI interface, false if GUI
      debug - true if debug mode, false otherwise

  • Method Details

    • startConnectionAndListen

      public void startConnectionAndListen​(java.lang.String ip, int port, java.lang.String nickname) throws java.io.IOException
      this method starts the connection to the server and the heartbeat
      Parameters:
      ip - of the server
      port - of the server
      nickname - of this client
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - in case of socket.close() failure

    • startHeartBeat

      private void startHeartBeat()
      method repeated every 2.5 seconds as heartbeat to the server

    • handleResponse

      private void handleResponse​(ServerMessage finalInputClass) throws RequestTimedOutException
      Handles a ServerResponse received from the server
      Parameters:
      finalInputClass - message received
      Throws:
      RequestTimedOutException - thrown if this response is received too late and the timeout has been reached

    • send

      public void send​(ClientMessage clientMessage)
      Send message to the Server
      Parameters:
      clientMessage - to be sent

    • sendExecutor

      private void sendExecutor​(ClientMessage clientMessage)
      slave method of Client.send
      Parameters:
      clientMessage - to be sent

    • sendAndWait

      public void sendAndWait​(ClientMessage clientMessage, int timeoutInSeconds) throws RequestTimedOutException
      Send Message and waits for answer
      Parameters:
      clientMessage - message to be sent
      timeoutInSeconds - time before RequestTimedOutException is thrown, -1 to wait indefinitely
      Throws:
      RequestTimedOutException - thrown if timeout is exceeded.

    • parametersSetup

      private void parametersSetup​(boolean CLI)
      gets parameters for the connection to the server
      Parameters:
      CLI - true if UI is CLI

      public void closeStream()

    • setPlayersNicknames

      public void setPlayersNicknames​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playersNickname)
      Initializes an array of nicknames and associates them with empty BriefModels, to be adjourned every turn from the server.
      Parameters:
      playersNickname - nicknames of players in the game.
